content: the rachel striped mock high neck crochet sweater is a long sleeved pullover sweater that is created primarily from two basic stitches - the single_crochet and the double_crochet the neckline is a high mock turtle neck that can be customized to be wider or tighter and longer so that it can be slightly rolled the sweater has ribbing at the base and ribbed cuffs on the sleeves it s designed to hit at your hips however it can also be customized easily this sweater pattern is slightly loose with some positive ease the rachel striped mock high neck crochet sweater is a free and easy crochet pattern available as a size inclusive made to measure pattern it is beginner friendly and uses weight 4/medium/worsted yarn
